text: The Umbro International Tournament was a pre-season football tournament, sponsored by the sportswear manufacturer Umbro. The tournament was held twice, hosted by Nottingham Forest in 1996 and Everton in 1997. Both editions were won by Chelsea. ==1996 Umbro International Tournament== Source: ===Semi-finals=== ===Third-place match=== ===Final=== ==1997 Umbro International Tournament== Source: ===Semi-finals=== ===Third-place match=== ===Final=== ==See also== *Wembley International Tournament == References == == External Links == Category:English football friendly trophies Category:Defunct football cup competitions in England Category:International sports competitions in Liverpool Category:Sports competitions in Nottingham Category:Football in Merseyside Category:Football in Nottinghamshire Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1996 Category:Recurring sporting events disestablished in 1997 Category:1996 establishments in England Category:1997 disestablishments in England
title: Umbro International Tournament
